properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.allow-core-thread-time-out
properties.description: 核心线程是否允许超时，默认false

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.await-termination-seconds
properties.description: 阻塞IOC容器关闭的时间，默认：10秒（必须设置setWaitForTasksToCompleteOnShutdown）

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.core-pool-size
properties.description: 核心线程数,默认：Java虚拟机可用线程数

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.enable
properties.description: 是否启动异步线程池，默认 false

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.keep-alive-seconds
properties.description: 线程池中线程最大空闲时间，默认：60，单位：秒

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.max-pool-size
properties.description: 线程池最大线程数,默认：40000

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.queue-capacity
properties.description: 线程队列最大线程数,默认：80000

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: 自定义线程名前缀，默认：Async-ThreadPool-

properties.name: spring.async-thread-pool.wait-for-tasks-to-complete-on-shutdown
properties.description: IOC容器关闭时是否阻塞等待剩余的任务执行完成，默认:false（必须设置setAwaitTerminationSeconds）
